---
title: "Ctenotus regius"
output: html_document
---


Ctenotus regius is a species of skinks exclusively found in Australia, mostly in arid areas with sparse ground cover.
They are medium-sized, and fast-moving that have a pattern combining stripes on the back and small white spots on the sides.
